response.overview: Iceland is an island of contrasts: Pristine glaciers next to wild waterfalls. Lush, green meadows lie gracefully between rugged mountains. Black lava rock is surrounded by hot, bubbling springs. Deep blue fjords are home to a unique abundance of fish. Once you have been here, you will never forget the untouched beauty of nature and be enchanted by it. Many myths and legends rightly have their origins here. This film takes you to the most beautiful and mysterious places of this Nordic beauty. Experience the magic of Iceland in high-resolution 4K images created with the latest 4K camera equipment and state-of-the-art 4K camera drones.
response.title: Iceland: The Magical Island
